user_instruction: 'Tell John to send an update on Project Falcon to me (sarah@apexmarketing.com). Ask him to consult his Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.content:
Hi John,

Could you please send me a brief update on Project Falcon at your earliest convenience? When you prepare it, feel free to consult any relevant notes or messages in your Gmail and our Notion workspace.

Please email the update to sarah@apexmarketing.com.

Thank you so much!

Best,  
Sarah

final_output:
